function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for increased COVID-19 spread due to lack of social distancing","Impact":"Higher rates of COVID-19 transmission and mortality","Mitigation":"Enforce strict social distancing measures and promote public awareness","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, crowd monitoring systems, and remote work technologies","People":"General population, particularly those at high risk","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about the impact of built environment on COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Ineffective interventions and policies for controlling disease spread","Mitigation":"Conduct further research and data analysis to understand the relationship","Technologies":"Data analytics, spatial modeling, and simulation-assisted frameworks","People":"Researchers, urban planners, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Potential for misinterpretation of study findings leading to inappropriate urban planning decisions","Impact":"Inefficient allocation of resources and creation of unsuitable living environments","Mitigation":"Engage experts in urban planning, public health, and epidemiology in interpreting the study results","Technologies":"Urban planning software, public health data analysis tools","People":"Urban planners, public health experts, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
